overview: Founder and CTO of Nomadesk. Miguel holds a Masters Degree in Civil Engineering and a Post Graduate Degree in Information Technology from the University of Ghent. He has a thorough theoretical and practical background in electronics and information technology. Miguel also has deep experience in project management, IT service management and quality assurance. Miguelâ€™s key area of technical expertise is the design and development of client-server applications, e-business applications and business critical databases. He has managed and implemented multiple projects in this field.
